headline: 3 Under-the-Radar Value AI Stocks With Market-Beating Potential
summary: Meanwhile, integrating AI-enabled solutions is the key to long-term growth at GE HealthCare (NASDAQ: GEHC).  A Bank of America analyst forecasts that Johnson Controls generated around $4 billion of its revenue from data centers in 2024.  Given that Wall Street estimates 2025 revenue will be about $23.4 billion, a conservative estimate of 10% growth from data center revenue would mean that data centers represent about 19% of Johnson Controls revenue in 2025.
